|Title=Knowing the epidemiology of smoking among pregnant women
|Description=Knowledge
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=10}}


* Pregnancy
** half of pregnant women continue to smoke during pregnancy
** more frequently among the youngest and least educated women

properties.question: What is the prevalence of smoking among pregnant women, and which demographic is more frequently affected?
properties.option_a: 30% of pregnant women smoke, with higher rates in middle-aged women.
properties.option_b: 50% of pregnant women smoke, particularly among the youngest and least educated women.
properties.option_c: 70% of pregnant women smoke, with a notable increase in educated women.
properties.option_d: 40% of pregnant women smoke, with no significant differences across age and education levels.
